Title: Provides for the recall power of the electors to remove an elective officer
Summary: Provides for the recall power of the electors to remove an elective officer.
LawCode: Ren Art 20 to be Art 21, add Art 20 §§1 - 6, Constn
ActClause: Concurrent Resolution of the Senate and Assembly proposing the addition of a new article 20 to the constitution, in relation to providing for recall of an elective officer
